subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dirk Nowitzki’s 3-pointer with 2.9 seconds capped a late rally by the Mavericks in their win over the Bulls. Nowitzki finished with a season-high 35 points.
snippet: Dirk Nowitzki’s 3-pointer with 2.9 seconds capped a late rally by the Mavericks in their win over the Bulls. Nowitzki finished with a season-high 35 points.
